amendment.description: To remove the emergency designation on VA Medical Care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2167 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2167 proposed by Senator Bond to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14496; text: CR S14496) To remove the emergency designation on VA Medical Care.
